alert.note: Alert for La Porte; St. Joseph; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 12:13AM EDT until July 15 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western St. Joseph County in north central Indiana... Starke County in northwestern Indiana... La Porte County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 100 AM EDT/midnight CDT/. * At 1212 AM EDT/1112 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Westville to Kouts, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Michigan City, La Porte, Westville, Knox, Trail Creek, Walkerton, New Carlisle, North Judson, Kingsford Heights, Wanatah, Hamlet, La Crosse, Pottawattamie Park, Koontz Lake, Hanna, Kingsbury, Lomax, Waterford, Ober and Pinhook. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 62. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
